answers.answer: Wow!  It sounds like you have your hands full.  I have five children, and until recently, our problems were the typical stuff--nothing shocking.  How is your son doing with school work?  Have you spoken with the school counselor?  Eating disorders, emotional stress, trouble in school, these can all be woven together to create what you are seeing.  I would speak with the school counselor and your pediatrician...try to get everyone on the same page (I know it's hard); brainstorm ideas between everyone.  Perhaps there is a problem at school that hasn't been addressed, or maybe your son is lacking something in his diet (or his body just has different needs)--perhaps that could have something to do with the eating thing.  I wish you all the best.
